title: If I Had A Hammer

lines.raw: [G7][C]If I had a [Em]hammer, [F]I'd hammer in the [G]morning,
[C]I'd hammer in the [Em]evening, [F]all over this [G]land.

tokens.lyric: danger, I'd hammer out a warning,

lines.raw: [C]I'd hammer out [Am]danger, I'd hammer out a warning,
[F]I'd hammer out [C]love between my [F]brothers and my [C]sisters,
[F]All [C]over [G]this [C]land. [Em] [F] [G]

tokens.lyric: If I had a bell, I'd ring it in the morning,

lines.raw: If I had a bell, I'd ring it in the morning,

tokens.lyric: I'd ring it in the evening, all over this land,

lines.raw: I'd ring it in the evening, all over this land,

tokens.lyric: I'd ring out danger, I'd ring out a warning,

lines.raw: I'd ring out danger, I'd ring out a warning,

tokens.lyric: I'd ring out love between my brothers and my sisters,

lines.raw: I'd ring out love between my brothers and my sisters,
All over this land.

tokens.lyric: If I had a song, I'd sing it in the morning

lines.raw: If I had a song, I'd sing it in the morning

tokens.lyric: I'd sing it in the evening, all over this land

lines.raw: I'd sing it in the evening, all over this land

tokens.lyric: I'd sing out danger I'd sing out a warning

lines.raw: I'd sing out danger I'd sing out a warning

tokens.lyric: I'd sing out love between my brothers and my sisters

lines.raw: I'd sing out love between my brothers and my sisters
All over this land

tokens.lyric: Well, I've got a hammer and I've got a bell

lines.raw: Well, I've got a hammer and I've got a bell

tokens.lyric: and I've got a song to sing, all over this land

lines.raw: and I've got a song to sing, all over this land

tokens.lyric: It's the hammer of justice; it's the bell of freedom

lines.raw: It's the hammer of justice; it's the bell of freedom

tokens.lyric: It's a song about love between my brothers and my sisters

lines.raw: It's a song about love between my brothers and my sisters
All over this land

source:
{title: If I Had A Hammer}
{key: C}
{reviewed: false}

[G7][C]If I had a [Em]hammer, [F]I'd hammer in the [G]morning,
[C]I'd hammer in the [Em]evening, [F]all over this [G]land.
[C]I'd hammer out [Am]danger, I'd hammer out a warning,
[F]I'd hammer out [C]love between my [F]brothers and my [C]sisters,
[F]All [C]over [G]this [C]land. [Em] [F] [G]

If I had a bell, I'd ring it in the morning,
I'd ring it in the evening, all over this land,
I'd ring out danger, I'd ring out a warning,
I'd ring out love between my brothers and my sisters,
All over this land.

If I had a song, I'd sing it in the morning
I'd sing it in the evening, all over this land
I'd sing out danger I'd sing out a warning
I'd sing out love between my brothers and my sisters
All over this land

Well, I've got a hammer and I've got a bell
and I've got a song to sing, all over this land
It's the hammer of justice; it's the bell of freedom
It's a song about love between my brothers and my sisters
All over this land
